其實做call centre黎講，我地係cold call比曬in-source合約/廣州同事去做
我地只係做warm call，當中再細分Inbound, Outbound & Retention
Outbound & Retention 姐係打比自己現有客戶做Upsell/續約
而Inbound就會係等客戶打黎查詢、申請服務/購買產品
而當中Call Centre Sales講
發展會係Team Manager/Business Development/Business Planning
Call Centre Service就我所知，會係Team Manager/Marketing Executive

會係Program前期先落去Service Centre做唔同位置作實習
中期開始會上返寫字樓做有關SmartLiving business方面工作
後期就會落位決定做有關SmartLiving果邊既Business Development
或者係Service Centre既Business Planning
